author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Changed implementation of ezcReflectionParameter::getType() to respect type
hints and prefer them over type annotations

author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Changed implementation of ezcReflectionParameter::getClass to rely only on
- Introduced ezcReflectionParameter::__call which forwards calls to additional
methods that might be provided by an external reflection source
- Added new test case for ezcReflectionParameter::getType on a parameter that
has only a type hint but no type annotation, which currently fails

author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Moved testSetDocParser() and testSetReflectionTypeFactory() to the very end
of the test suite since they modify class variables of ezcReflectionApi

author: sb:ez.no
msg: Make new test runner the default.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Merged XHTML and ODT DOM elemenets.
- Added ODT test cases to global test suite.
